00277       // Array that holds all available group objects.

00280       // Set of pointers to local groups.
00281       ArraySet< Group<N> >   groupSet_;
00282 
00283       // Set of pointers to incomplete local groups.
00284       ArraySet< Group<N> >   incompleteGroupSet_;

00288 
00289       // Array of pointers to groups, indexed by Id.
00290       // Elements corresponding to absent groups hold null pointers.
00291       DArray< Group<N>* >    groupPtrs_;

00296       // Capacity for local groups on this processor.
00297       int capacity_;
00298 
00299       // Maximum number of groups on all processors, maximum id + 1
00300       int totalCapacity_;
00301

00354    * Read parameters and allocate memory.

00356    template <int N>
00357    void GroupStorage<N>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00358    {
00359       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00360       read<int>(in, "totalCapacity", totalCapacity_);
00361       allocate();
00362    }

00364    /*
00365    * Set parameters and allocate memory.
00366    */
00367    template <int N>
00368    void GroupStorage<N>::initialize(int capacity, int totalCapacity)
00369    {
00370       capacity_      = capacity;
00371       totalCapacity_ = totalCapacity;
00372       allocate();
00373    }

00375    /*
00376    * Set total number of distinct groups on all processors.
00377    */
00378    template <int N>
00379    void GroupStorage<N>::setNTotal(int nTotal)
00380    {  nTotal_ = nTotal; }
00381 
00382    /*
00383    * Allocate and initialize all containers (private).
00384    */
00385    template <int N>
00386    void GroupStorage<N>::allocate()
00387    {
00388       groups_.allocate(capacity_);
00389       reservoir_.allocate(capacity_);
00390       groupSet_.allocate(groups_);
00391       incompleteGroupSet_.allocate(groups_);
00392       groupPtrs_.allocate(totalCapacity_);
00393 
00394       // Push all groups onto reservoir stack, in reverse order.
00395       for (int i = capacity_ - 1; i >=0; --i) {
00396           reservoir_.push(groups_[i]);
00397       }
00398 
00399       // Nullify all pointers in groupPtrs_ array.
00400       for (int i = 0; i < totalCapacity_; ++i) {
00401          groupPtrs_[i] = 0;
00402       }
00403 
00404    }
00405 
00406    // Local group mutators
00407 
00408    /*
00409    * Returns address for a new local Group.
00410    */ 
00411    template <int N>
00412    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::newPtr()
00413    {
00414       // Precondition
00415       if (newPtr_ != 0) 
00416          UTIL_THROW("Unregistered newPtr_ still active");
00417       newPtr_ = &reservoir_.pop();
00418       newPtr_->clear();
00419       return newPtr_;
00420    }
00421 
00422    /*
00423    * Pushes unused pointer back onto reservoir.
00424    */ 
00425    template <int N>
00426    void GroupStorage<N>::returnPtr()
00427    {
00428       // Preconditions
00429       if (newPtr_ == 0) 
00430          UTIL_THROW("No active newPtr_");
00431       newPtr_->setId(-1);
00432       reservoir_.push(*newPtr_);
00433       newPtr_ = 0;
00434    }
00435 
00436    /*
00437    * Register new local Group in internal data structures.
00438    */ 
00439    template <int N>
00440    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::add()
00441    {
00442 
00443       // Preconditions
00444       if (newPtr_ == 0) {
00445          UTIL_THROW("No active newPtr_");
00446       }
00447       int groupId = newPtr_->id();
00448       if (groupId < 0 || groupId >= totalCapacity_) {
00449          std::cout << "groupId = " << groupId << std::endl;
00450          UTIL_THROW("Invalid group id");
00451       }
00452       if (groupPtrs_[groupId] != 0) {
00453          UTIL_THROW("Group with specified id is already present");
00454       }
00455 
00456       // Add Group<N> object to container
00457       groupSet_.append(*newPtr_);
00458       groupPtrs_[groupId] = newPtr_;
00459 
00460       // Release newPtr_ for reuse.
00461       Group<N>* ptr = newPtr_;
00462       newPtr_ = 0;
00463 
00464       return ptr;
00465    }
00466 
00467    /*
00468    * Add a new Group with a specified id, return pointer to new Group.
00469    */
00470    template <int N>
00471    Group<N>* GroupStorage<N>::add(int id)
00472    {
00473       Group<N>* ptr = newPtr();
00474       ptr->setId(id);
00475       add();
00476       return ptr;
00477    }
00478 
00479    /*
00480    * Remove a specific local Group.
00481    */
00482    template <int N>
00483    void GroupStorage<N>::remove(Group<N>* groupPtr)
00484    {
00485       int groupId = groupPtr->id();
00486       if (groupId < 0 || groupId >= totalCapacity_) {
00487          std::cout << "Group id = " << groupId << std::endl;
00488          UTIL_THROW("Invalid group id, out of range");
00489       } else if (groupPtrs_[groupId] == 0) {
00490          UTIL_THROW("Group does not exist on this processor");
00491       }
00492       reservoir_.push(*groupPtr);
00493       groupSet_.remove(*groupPtr);
00494       groupPtrs_[groupId] = 0;
00495       groupPtr->setId(-1);
00496    }
00497 
00498    /*
00499    * Add to set of incomplete groups.
00500    */
00501    template <int N>
00502    void GroupStorage<N>::addIncomplete(Group<N>* groupPtr)
00503    {
00504       int id = groupPtr->id();
00505       if (groupPtrs_[id] == 0) {
00506          UTIL_THROW("Ptr does not point to local group");
00507       }
00508       incompleteGroupSet_.append(*groupPtr);
00509    }
00510 
00511    /*
00512    * Remove from set of incomplete groups.
00513    */
00514    template <int N>
00515    void GroupStorage<N>::removeIncomplete(Group<N>* groupPtr)
00516    {
00517       int id = groupPtr->id();
00518       if (groupPtrs_[id] == 0) {
00519          UTIL_THROW("Ptr does not point to local group");
00520       }
00521       incompleteGroupSet_.remove(*groupPtr);
00522    }
00523 
00524    /*
00525    * Clear incomplete group set (remove all).
00526    */
00527    template <int N>
00528    void GroupStorage<N>::clearIncompleteSet()
00529    {  incompleteGroupSet_.clear(); }

00568    /*
00569    * Check validity of this GroupStorage.
00570    *
00571    * Returns true if all is ok, or throws an Exception.
00572    */
00573    template <int N>
00574    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid()
00575    {
00576       
00577       if (size() + reservoir_.size() != capacity_) 
00578          UTIL_THROW("nGroup + reservoir size != local capacity"); 
00579 
00580       Group<N>* ptr;
00581       int       i, j;
00582       j = 0;
00583       for (i = 0; i < totalCapacity_ ; ++i) {
00584          ptr = groupPtrs_[i];
00585          if (ptr != 0) {
00586             ++j;
00587             if (ptr->id() != i) {
00588                UTIL_THROW("ptr->id() != i"); 
00589             }
00590          }
00591       }
00592 
00593       // Count local groups
00594       GroupIterator<N> iter;
00595       j = 0;
00596       for (begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00597          ++j;
00598          ptr = find(iter->id());
00599          if (ptr == 0)
00600             UTIL_THROW("Unable to find local group returned by iterator"); 
00601          if (ptr != iter.get())
00602             UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent find(iter->id()"); 
00603       }
00604       if (j != size())
00605          UTIL_THROW("Number from iterator != size()"); 
00606 
00607       return true;
00608    }
00609 
00613    template <int N>
00614    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00615    void GroupStorage<N>::computeNTotal(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00616    #else
00617    void GroupStorage<N>::computeNTotal()
00618    #endif
00619    {
00620       GroupIterator<N> iterator;
00621       Atom* atomPtr;
00622       int nLocal = 0;
00623       begin(iterator);
00624       for ( ; iterator.notEnd(); ++iterator) {
00625          atomPtr = iterator->atomPtr(0);
00626          if (atomPtr) {
00627             if (!atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00628                ++nLocal;
00629             }
00630          }
00631       }
00632       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00633       communicator.Reduce(&nLocal, &nTotal_, 1, 
00634                           MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, 0);
00635       if (communicator.Get_rank() !=0) {
00636          nTotal_ = -1;
00637       }
00638       #else
00639       nTotal_ = nLocal;
00640       #endif
00641    }
00642 
00643    /*
00644    * Check validity of all groups on this processor.
00645    */
00646    template <int N>
00647    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00648    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid(AtomStorage& atomStorage, MPI::Intracomm& communicator,
00649                                  bool hasGhosts)
00650    #else
00651    bool GroupStorage<N>::isValid(AtomStorage& atomStorage, bool hasGhosts)
00652    #endif
00653    {
00654       int i;
00655       int atomId;
00656       int nAtom;  // Number of local atoms in particular group.
00657       int nGhost; // Number of local atoms in particular group.
00658       int nAtomGroup = 0; // Number of local atoms in all groups on processor
00659       Atom* atomPtr;
00660       ConstGroupIterator<N> groupIter;
00661 
00662       // Call simpler function that only checks storage data structures.
00663       isValid();
00664 
00665       // Loop over groups.
00666       begin(groupIter);
00667       for ( ; groupIter.notEnd(); ++groupIter) {
00668          nAtom = 0;
00669          nGhost = 0;
00670          for (i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00671             atomId  = groupIter->atomId(i);
00672             if (atomId < 0 || atomId >= atomStorage.totalAtomCapacity()) {
00673                UTIL_THROW("Invalid atom id in Group");
00674             }
00675             atomPtr = groupIter->atomPtr(i);
00676             if (atomPtr) {
00677                if (atomPtr != atomStorage.find(atomId)) {
00678                   UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent non-null atom pointer in Group");
00679                }
00680                if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00681                   ++nGhost;
00682                } else {
00683                   ++nAtom;
00684                }
00685             } else {
00686                atomPtr = atomStorage.find(atomId);
00687                if (atomPtr != 0) {
00688                   if (atomPtr->isGhost()) {
00689                      if (hasGhosts) {
00690                           UTIL_THROW("Missing ghost atom");
00691                      }
00692                   } else {
00693                      UTIL_THROW("Missing local atom");
00694                   }
00695                }
00696             }
00697          }
00698          if (nAtom == 0) {
00699             UTIL_THROW("Empty group");
00700          }
00701          if (hasGhosts && (nAtom + nGhost) < N) {
00702             UTIL_THROW("Incomplete group");
00703          }
00704          nAtomGroup += nAtom;
00705       }
00706 
00707       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00708       // Count & return number of local atoms in groups on all processors.
00709       int nAtomGroupTotal;
00710       const int source = 0;
00711       communicator.Reduce(&nAtomGroup, &nAtomGroupTotal, 1, 
00712                           MPI::INT, MPI::SUM, source);
00713       if (communicator.Get_rank() == source) {
00714          if (nTotal_ < 0) {
00715             UTIL_THROW("nTotal not set before isValid");
00716          }
00717          if (nAtomGroupTotal != nTotal_*N) {
00718             std::cout << "nAtomGroupTotal = " << nAtomGroupTotal << std::endl;
00719             std::cout << "nTotal*N        = " << nTotal_*N  << std::endl;
00720             UTIL_THROW("Discrepancy in number of local atoms in Group objects");
00721          }
00722       }
00723       #endif
00724 
00725       return true;
00726    }
00727 }
00728 #endif
